text: Namat Abdullah (30 March 1946 - 17 December 2020) was a Malaysian football player. He was born in Penang, Malaysia. Abdullah played for Penang F.C. between 1967 and 1977. He also played for the national team between 1967 and 1975. Abdullah died on 17 December 2020 in Perak, Malaysia from stomach cancer at the age of 74.Former national footballer Namat Abdullah dies aged 74 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Malaysian sportspeople Category:Asian footballers Category:People from Penang
title: Namat Abdullah
